item.description:
This PARENTING WORKSHOP is for parents or anyone who cares for children and want to know why SPIRITUALITY matters in conscious parenting. We will cover the topic of MEDITATION AND PRAYER WITH CHILDREN and how to help them to develop a LOVING RELATIONSHIP WITH GOD and Its creation. All faith are welcome.

In my work as a minister, as a family support specialist for the City of Cambridge and as a parent myself, I have witnessed and experienced that children thrive when they feel love and experience a sense of belonging to creation. Whatever your faith may be, spirituality plays an important part in your child's development and well being.

Cost is $10/person or $15/couple
item.name: Meditation with children and conscious parenting
